title: Bridgerton
cast: Adjoa Andoh, Julie Andrews, Lorraine Ashbourne
desc: The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society. Inspired by Julia Quinn's bestselling novels.

episodes.title: Diamond of the First Water
episodes.desc: Daphne debuts on London's marriage market as a new gossip sheet sets high society atwitter and Simon, the eligible Duke of Hastings, returns to town.

episodes.title: Shock an Delight
episodes.desc: Simonâ€™s apparent courtship of Daphne angers her brother Anthony and threatens to ruin the arrangements he made. Marina opens up to a curious Penelope.

episodes.title: Art of the Swoon
episodes.desc: After Daphne catches the eye of a royal suitor, she turns to Simon for relationship advice. Lady Featherington tries to browbeat Marina into marriage.

episodes.title: An Affair of Honor
episodes.desc: Daphne receives a stunning gift from Prince Friedrich but soon courts scandal at a ball. Eloise searches for clues to Lady Whistledown's identity.
